attributes.action: give a valid response to the resign petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After signing the resign petition I feel the prime minister did not adequately address the concerns of the British people, 72,234 people asked him to leave, his response which can be seen here; http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21213 is wholly inadequate given the sheer volume of people behind this petition. 

His language is empty and avoids the issue rather than addressing the fact that the British people do not want this unelected leader to continue in his role. He should have addressed our concerns directly instead he gave us the same old nonsense that he's trying to fix the problems, we the undersigned believe he is incompetent to resolve the issues his government has created and thus his response is meaningless

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
